meta.title: SEO Tools - Website Optimization Tools
meta.description: Free online SEO tools to analyze and optimize your website performance. No installation required, works directly in your browser.
meta.keywords: seo tools, website optimization, page speed checker, seo analysis, free seo tools

title: SEO Tools
description: Free online tools to analyze and optimize your website performance

pageSpeedChecker.title: Page Speed Checker
pageSpeedChecker.description: Analyze website loading speed and get performance improvement suggestions

linkStatusChecker.title: Link Status Checker
linkStatusChecker.description: Check the status of all links on a webpage to find broken links

seoCannibalizationChecker.title: SEO Cannibalization Checker
seoCannibalizationChecker.description: Check for keyword cannibalization (competition) within your site
